member.name: ID3D10EffectTechnique.ComputeStateBlockMask
member.summary: Compute a state-block mask to allow/prevent state changes.
member.param: A pointer to a state-block mask (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectTechnique.GetAnnotationByIndex
member.param: The zero-based index of the interface pointer.

member.name: ID3D10EffectTechnique.GetDesc
member.param: A pointer to a technique description (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectTechnique.IsValid
member.summary: Test a technique to see if it contains valid syntax.
member.returns: TRUE if the code syntax is valid; otherwise FALSE.
